sense.gloss: to meet, to encounter, to see
to have an accident, to have a bad experience

sdata.j: ↑見↑↓み↓つかったらひどい↑目↑↓め↓に|↑遭↑↓あ↓う|ぞ。
sdata.e: If you are found out, you'll catch it.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑事故↑↓じこ↓に|↑遭↑↓あ↓う|のではないかと↑心配↑↓しんぱい↓した。
sdata.e: She was afraid of his having an accident.

sdata.j: ↑猛↑↓もう↓↑吹雪↑↓ふぶき↓に|↑遭↑↓あ↓う|までは↑順調↑↓じゅんちょう↓に↑進↑↓すす↓んだ。
sdata.e: We made good time until we ran into a blizzard.

sdata.j: ↑理不尽↑↓りふじん↓な↑事↑↓こと↓ばかり↑言↑↓い↓ってると、そのうち↑痛↑↓いた↓い↑目↑↓め↓に|↑遭↑↓あ↓う|ぞ。
sdata.e: If you keep saying senseless things, you'll eventually be sorry for it.
